entries.femaleVariant:
The baton from Ubiquitous Chib is sturdier than NCPD standard issue and the ergonomics are much improved. No more Repetitive Strain Injury from bashing skulls!
- Officer A. Murphy, NCPD

The salesman suggested a machete for my problem. Now I can sleep without being woken by my neighbour's dog.
- Yann Lepentrec

I bought an ornate Katana and Tanto set from a guy behind The Time Machine and when my boss came over for dinner she offered me a promotion!
- C. Figgis

Are you a Heywood salaryman shuffling between the office and your conapt in Wellsprings every day?
Does your boss disrespect you because you don't have a ceremonial sword or Tanto?
Are you a major league mercenary late for a meeting at Embers but you forgot your Neurotoxin knife?
Do you desire the fear and respect on the street that comes with a CHAINSWORD?

Then come on down to The Ubiquitous Chib - Heywood, behind The Time Machine where our expert staff will help you find the melee weapon of your dreams!
